org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmanager.archive

Interface ArchiveListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemoryArchivist

    public interface ArchiveListener
    Interface used to implement Archivists, that store old JobManager information discarded by the EventCollector. Archivists can decide how to store the data (memory, database, files...)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void archiveEvent(JobID jobId, AbstractEvent event)
      Stores event in archive

      Stores old job in archive
